sys_ui_message.message:
You can find your payslips, IRP5 certificates and other documents on [Workday](http://wd3.myworkday.com/absa/d/home.htmld). For more information, have a look at the following guides:
- [Payslips](https://absahr.service-now.com/myhrportal?sys_kb_id=25dee5e41b422c507cb065bfe54bcb0f&id=kb_article_view&sysparm_rank=3&sysparm_tsqueryId=76365a6e1bf7f810b637a97ce54bcb7d) - [Tax Certificates](https://absahr.service-now.com/myhrportal?sys_kb_id=cd040c0e1b43e4103231ea0ee54bcb5f&id=kb_article_view&sysparm_rank=1&sysparm_tsqueryId=8af41eaa1bf7f810b637a97ce54bcb48)
